name: PIV
description:
Controls KEYBOARD
  • Move:  A and D  or Arrow Keys
  • Jump:  Space or Right Click
  • Reset: R (held)
CONTROLLER (if controller isn't working, (re)connect while game is running)
  • Move:  Either Stick or D-pad
  • Jump:  South Button
  • Reset:  Select (held)

Try and collect all the coins and beat your best time!

Try and beat my PB! 35.22

Piv has a set of controls with a complex set of available moves. You will need all the skills below to beat the game:

High Jump:  Hold Jump Down

Wall Slide: Move toward a wall while touching it to slow fall

Wall Jump: Move toward a wall while touching it and jump

Triple Jump: Press jump just as you land for an even higher jump. This can be done three times.

Long Jump: Double Press Jump + Direction (Holding the second jump press launches you further)

Backflip: A high jump in a tight space, reach full speed in one direction, then quickly change direction and jump

Tip: You can go through spikes, but you can't go into them.
